description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    Enhancements
   DIAGRAMNET-50570-Add support to modify comments in the Visio diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-50665-ImageSaveOptions.ImageBrightness does not work
   DIAGRAMNET-50684-VSD to SVG export does not preserve shape ids
   
    Bugs      
   DIAGRAMNET-50188-VSD to PDF conversion, the word "text" is added in the shape's text
   DIAGRAMNET-50309-Incorrect setting of connector text location
   DIAGRAMNET-50448-VSD to VDX conversion, dynamic connector is not being connected properly
   DIAGRAMNET-50502-VSD to PDF conversion, connector text items are misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50503-VSD to HTML conversion, connector text items are misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50597-VSDX to PDF conversion, missing shape's text item
   DIAGRAMNET-50599-VSDX to PDF conversion, the shape's text position is slightly misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50602-VSDX to HTML conversion, missing shape's text item
   DIAGRAMNET-50604-VSDX to HTML conversion, the shape's text position is slightly misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50655-Shape.GluedShapes method returns incorrect shape ids
   DIAGRAMNET-50660-VSD to PDF export, the text items are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-50664-VSD to PDF conversion, the date strings turn into integer numbers
   DIAGRAMNET-50672-Aspose.Diagram API does not preserve Name and NameU properties of the sub shapes
	 DIAGRAMNET-50675-Warning of the missing attribute when opened the resultant VDX diagram
	 DIAGRAMNET-50676-Shape.connectedShapes method does not detect some incoming shape ids
	 DIAGRAMNET-50683-[Output VDX] - Duplicate of an element warning message
	 DIAGRAMNET-50685-Output format VDX - Can't connect two Visio shapes
	 DIAGRAMNET-50686-VSD to PDF conversion, form tabs text is shifted down
	 DIAGRAMNET-50688-VDX to VSDX export - the Null Reference Exception occurred
	 DIAGRAMNET-50690-VSD to VDX export - the background text color of the shapes turns into black
	 DIAGRAMNET-50691-VSD to VDX export - the arrows of diagram are misplaced
	 DIAGRAMNET-50692-VSD to VDX export - the text of the shapes goes outside the boundary
	 DIAGRAMNET-50693-VSD to VDX export, ConnectCollection returns incorrect count of the connects and values
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
